SEARCH
Package com.example

Class BankAccountsManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.BankAccountsManager
public class BankAccountsManager extends Object
Manages multiple BankAccount objects, providing methods for adding accounts, closing them, applying global interest, etc.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BankAccountsManager()
    Creates an empty manager for BankAccount objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAccount(BankAccount account)
    Adds a new BankAccount to the manager.
    void
    applyGlobalInterestRate()
    Applies the global/default interest rate to all accounts in the manager.
    void
    closeAllAccounts()
    Closes all accounts by setting their balance to 0 and then clearing the manager's list.
    BankAccount
    findRichestAccount()
    Finds the richest account in the manager.
    List<BankAccount>
    getAccounts()
    Returns an unmodifiable view of the managed accounts.
    void
    transfer(BankAccount from, BankAccount to, double amount)
    Transfers an amount between two different accounts.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • BankAccountsManager

      public BankAccountsManager()
      Creates an empty manager for BankAccount objects.

  • Method Details

    • addAccount

      public void addAccount(BankAccount account)
      Adds a new BankAccount to the manager.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the account is null.

    • closeAllAccounts

      public void closeAllAccounts()
      Closes all accounts by setting their balance to 0 and then clearing the manager's list.

    • findRichestAccount

      public BankAccount findRichestAccount()
      Finds the richest account in the manager.
      Returns:
      The account with the highest balance, or null if no accounts exist.

    • applyGlobalInterestRate

      public void applyGlobalInterestRate()
      Applies the global/default interest rate to all accounts in the manager.

    • transfer

      public void transfer(BankAccount from, BankAccount to, double amount)
      Transfers an amount between two different accounts.
      Parameters:
      from - The source account.
      to - The target account.
      amount - The amount to transfer (must be > 0 and <= 'from' balance).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if 'from' or 'to' is null, or amount <= 0.

    • getAccounts

      public List<BankAccount> getAccounts()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the managed accounts.
      Returns:
      a read-only list of accounts.
